item.description: Building Your First Shiny Database Application class: center, middle, inverse, title-slide # Building Your First Shiny Database Application ### Matthew Sharkey | msharkey3434@gmail.com ### 2019-04-03 --- # About Me Matthew Sharkey, MBA, MS-BIA | Data Engineer @ HDR <div> <center> ![me](C:/Users/mshar/OneDrive/Documents/R_UG_Demo/04-Images/legoGuy.jpg) </center> <div> --- # Agenda 1. RDBMS Use Cases 2. Building and Managing Connections 3. Performance & Optimization --- # Why use an RDBMS? - Potential Performance Gains -- + Indexing - Ordering data by a key e.
